events.name: lithium-ion battery recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion battery recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion battery recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal in pyrometallurgy.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal in pyrometallurgy.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes to precipitate a particular metal.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes to precipitate a particular metal.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: Supply chain strategies
events.wd_description: Implementing strategies to improve profit margins, reduce production costs, and increase market share in the EV battery industry.
events.description: Implementing strategies to improve profit margins, reduce production costs, and increase market share in the EV battery industry.

events.name: Profit margin improvement
events.wd_description: Strategies to improve profit margins by engaging with lower-cost suppliers and enhancing operational efficiency.
events.description: Strategies to improve profit margins by engaging with lower-cost suppliers and enhancing operational efficiency.

events.name: Cost reduction strategies
events.wd_description: Reducing production costs through technological advancements and further R&D investment.
events.description: Reducing production costs through technological advancements and further R&D investment.

events.name: Market expansion
events.wd_description: Expanding market share by entering new markets such as the stationary storage market.
events.description: Expanding market share by entering new markets such as the stationary storage market.

events.name: Supply chain trends and patterns
events.wd_description: Identifying patterns and trends in the supply chain based on coded interview data, including key supplier locations, cost factors, and other relevant elements.
events.description: Identifying patterns and trends in the supply chain based on coded interview data, including key supplier locations, cost factors, and other relevant elements.

events.name: Key  supplier locations
events.wd_description: Identifying the locations of key suppliers in the EV battery supply chain and their impact on the overall supply network.
events.description: Identifying the locations of key suppliers in the EV battery supply chain and their impact on the overall supply network.

events.name: Cost factors
events.wd_description: Analyzing cost factors affecting the EV battery supply chain, including production costs and supplier pricing.
events.description: Analyzing cost factors affecting the EV battery supply chain, including production costs and supplier pricing.

events.name: Ethics and sustainability
events.wd_description: Evaluating ethical and sustainability practices within the EV battery supply chain, focusing on sourcing and production processes.
events.description: Evaluating ethical and sustainability practices within the EV battery supply chain, focusing on sourcing and production processes.

events.name: Infrastructure
events.wd_description: Assessing the infrastructure supporting the EV battery supply chain, including logistics and transportation networks.
events.description: Assessing the infrastructure supporting the EV battery supply chain, including logistics and transportation networks.

events.name: External events
events.wd_description: Analyzing the impact of external events on the EV battery supply chain, such as geopolitical events and economic shifts.
events.description: Analyzing the impact of external events on the EV battery supply chain, such as geopolitical events and economic shifts.

events.name: Exploring technology
events.wd_description: Exploring technological advancements and their influence on the EV battery supply chain, including innovations in battery technology.
events.description: Exploring technological advancements and their influence on the EV battery supply chain, including innovations in battery technology.

events.name: Examine supply and demand
events.wd_description: Examining supply and demand dynamics within the EV battery supply chain and their effects on market stability.
events.description: Examining supply and demand dynamics within the EV battery supply chain and their effects on market stability.

events.name: Lead times and timescales
events.wd_description: Analyzing lead times and production timescales in the EV battery supply chain to identify opportunities for optimization.
events.description: Analyzing lead times and production timescales in the EV battery supply chain to identify opportunities for optimization.
